Ticket Description: Unable to submit timesheet in portal after approval
Ticket Solution: Verify if the timesheet is already approved. If issue persists, raise an SR and clear browser cache.

Ticket Description: Unable to locate updated holiday list in HR portal
Ticket Solution: Navigate to HR section Holiday Calendar. If not visible, contact HR support.

Ticket Description: Incorrect billing hours shown in dashboard
Ticket Solution: Cross-check approved timesheets and allocation. If mismatch remains, escalate to project manager and IT.
